sn45.50-54:0.3: 50–54. Five Discourses on Accomplishment in Ethics, Etc. (1st)
sn45.50-54:1.1: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.
sn45.50-54:1.2: In the same way accomplishment in ethics is the forerunner and precursor of the noble eightfold path for a mendicant.
sn45.50-54:1.3: A mendicant accomplished in ethics can expect …” …
